prop.name: recordLabel
prop.desc: The label that issued the release.

prop.name: catalogNumber
prop.desc: The catalog number for the release.

prop.name: creditedTo
prop.desc: The group the release is credited to if different than the byArtist. For example, Red and Blue is credited to "Stefani Germanotta Band", but by Lady Gaga.

prop.name: releaseOf
prop.desc: The album this is a release of.

prop.name: duration
prop.desc: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.

prop.name: musicReleaseFormat
prop.desc: Format of this release (the type of recording media used, ie. compact disc, digital media, LP, etc.).

MusicPlaylist.name: track
MusicPlaylist.desc: A music recording (track)—usually a single song. If an ItemList is given, the list should contain items of type MusicRecording.

MusicPlaylist.name: numTracks
MusicPlaylist.desc: The number of tracks in this album or playlist.

MusicPlaylist.name: tracks
MusicPlaylist.desc: A music recording (track)—usually a single song.
